title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - July 27, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - July 27, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark get together to discuss the impending recall of Gavin Newsom, the extreme bail levied against Tom Barrack, an update on Jussie Smollett and more!

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
